# Accept Recruitment

> Leading recruitment agency specializing in Industrial, Warehouse, Driving and Technical roles across Leicester, Coventry and Tamworth

## About

Accept Recruitment is the highest-rated recruitment agency in the UK, with 4.8 stars from 950+ Google reviews. We specialize in connecting top talent with leading employers across the Midlands region.

## Services

### For Candidates
- Warehouse Jobs
- Driving Jobs  
- Industrial Jobs
- Food Production Jobs
- Technical Jobs
- Commercial Jobs

### For Employers
- Temporary Staffing
- Permanent Recruitment
- Managed Services
- Onboarding Support

## Locations

- **Leicester HQ**: 0116 218 2133
- **Coventry Office**: 024 7718 0356
- **Tamworth Office**: 01827 438 334

## Coverage Areas

Leicester, Coventry, Tamworth, Nuneaton, Warwick, Daventry, Crick (LE, CV, B77-79, NN postcodes)

## Key Features

- 950+ Google Reviews (4.8 stars)
- ISO 9001 Certified
- GLAA Licensed
- REC Member
- Disability Confident Employer
- Armed Forces Covenant Signatory

## Awards

- Best Recruitment Agency of the Year (Leicestershire Promotions Awards)
- Three Best Rated - Top Recruitment Agency in Leicester

- Website: https://acceptrec.co.uk
